assertAlmostEqual(actual, expected, epsilon, message): Compares floating-point numbers within tolerance (default 0.0001)
  - Validates inputs are numbers
  - Handles NaN: both NaN = equal, one NaN = throws
  - Handles Infinity: same infinity = equal, different = throws
  - Throws AssertionError if |actual - expected| > epsilon

DEFAULT_EPSILON: 0.0001 (4 decimal places precision)

Exports: { assertAlmostEqual, DEFAULT_EPSILON }
